remarks: Lemma for ~ dvid and ~ dvconst .  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 8-Aug-2014.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 9-Feb-2015.)
statement:
dvidlem.1 $e |- ( ph -> F : CC --> CC ) $.
dvidlem.2 $e |- ( ( ph /\ ( x e. CC /\ z e. CC /\ z =/= x ) ) -> ( ( ( F ` z ) - ( F ` x ) ) / ( z - x ) ) = B ) $.
dvidlem.3 $e |- B e. CC $.
dvidlem $p |- ( ph -> ( CC _D F ) = ( CC X. { B } ) ) $.
$d B x z $.
$d F x z $.
$d ph x z $.
